Name: Octopus - Deploy Octoterra Project (S3 Backend)
Description:
This step exposes the field required to deploy a project or space serialized with [octoterra](https://github.com/OctopusSolutionsEngineering/OctopusTerraformExport) using Terraform.

This step configures a Terraform S3 backend.

It is recommended that this step be run with the `octopuslabs/terraform-workertools` worker image.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Terraform.Workspace.Name
Parameters.Label: Terraform Workspace
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the Terraform workspace. This must be unique for every project this module is deployed to. The default value is based on the space name: `#{Octopus.Space.Name | Replace "[^A-Za-z0-9]" "_"}`

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Terraform.Package.Id
Parameters.Label: Terraform Module Package
Parameters.HelpText: The package created by [octoterra](https://github.com/OctopusSolutionsEngineering/OctopusTerraformExport). It must include the `space_population` directory.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Octopus.ApiKey
Parameters.Label: Octopus API key
Parameters.HelpText: The Octopus API key. See the [documentation](https://octopus.com/docs/octopus-rest-api/how-to-create-an-api-key) for details on creating an API key.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Octopus.SpaceID
Parameters.Label: Octopus Space ID
Parameters.HelpText: The Space ID to deploy the Terraform module into. The [Octopus - Lookup Space ID](https://library.octopus.com/step-templates/324f747e-e2cd-439d-a660-774baf4991f2/actiontemplate-octopus-lookup-space-id) step can be used to convert a space name to an ID.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.AWS.S3.BucketName
Parameters.Label: AWS S3 Bucket Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the S3 bucket used to hold the Terraform state. See the [Terraform documentation](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/settings/backends/s3) for details on using S3 as a backend.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.AWS.S3.BucketRegion
Parameters.Label: AWS S3 Bucket Region
Parameters.HelpText: The AWS region hosting the S3 bucket. See the [Terraform documentation](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/settings/backends/s3) for details on using S3 as a backend.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.AWS.S3.BucketKey
Parameters.Label: AWS S3 Bucket Key
Parameters.HelpText:
The S3 file used to hold the Terraform state. See the [Terraform documentation](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/settings/backends/s3) for details on using S3 as a backend. The combination of the workspace name and this key must be unique. 

The default value is the name of the project: `#{Octopus.Project.Name | Replace "[^A-Za-z0-9]" "_"}`.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Terraform.AdditionalApplyParams
Parameters.Label: Terraform Additional Apply Params
Parameters.HelpText: This field can be used to define additional parameters passed to the `terraform apply` command. This field can be left blank. See the [Terraform documentation](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/apply) for details on the `apply` command.

Parameters.Name: OctoterraApply.Terraform.AdditionalInitParams
Parameters.Label: Terraform Additional Init Params
Parameters.HelpText: This field can be used to define additional parameters passed to the `terraform init` command. This field can be left blank.  See the [Terraform documentation](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/init) for details on the `init` command.
